## matchIsMatchExpr variable

Type guard to check if a [Match](./core.match.md) is a [MatchExpr](./core.matchexpr.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
matchIsMatchExpr: (match: Match) => match is MatchExpr
```
